member.postal_address: Office 205, 47A Evelpidon & 33 Lefkados Str., GR-113 62 Athens, Greece

shortcv.p: Chrysanthi Papoutsi graduated in 2006 from the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business. As a member of the IRIS group, she has participated in the GUIDE project and is currently contributing to the work of the IA-5 group in E-Business Forum, concerning identity management in e-government services. Her main research interests lie in the development and management of Information Systems and their implications for organisations and societies.
